name: MyUniden+
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Enable the skill in your Alexa App, and you can view the video feed on Echo Show by simply saying “Alexa, show the front door camera.”

Please note that you are only able to view video steam and listen to audio from your Camera; you will not be able to speak to people through your Echo Show.

To get started, simply tap the “Enable” button, link your Alexa account to your My Uniden+ account. After linking your account and discovering your cameras in your Alexa account, you can start streaming video to your Echo Show or Echo Spot with commands like:
- "Alexa, show the front door camera"

To stop your camera from streaming video, you can say:
- "Alexa, stop the front door camera"

When using this Skill, you need to specify the name of the desired camera. The name is equivalent to the device name of your camera and can be found and configured in the app
